data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,419 believers in Albacete against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 90,966 who are far from you in Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Moor people.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,419 believers in Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the county of Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain has a population of 400,900.

We estimate Albacete has 6,419 people who might know Jesus, 303,515 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 90,966 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
